name: Petrichor (itch) (6six6)
description:
One day a man had an accident in the wilderness. What fate awaits him as rain falls down onto the forest below?

Petrichor is an escape room type puzzle game that should be completable in around a half hour for at least one ending (a walkthrough and in game in guidance is available for those who want/need it)

This was made for the Build Your Own Game Jam (Drifty 6th Annual). It uses the themes "Not What it Seems", "Survival", and "Purple". It also has "babies" in select segments.

This release of the game includes guidance material and small amounts of content specifically for the Game JAM, and any future versions that may be compiled will not include those.
